INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have the terms of engagement not yet been agreed?</p><i><p>If any of the following factors are relevant to this audit assignment, a new letter of engagement should be issued:</p><ul> <li>A recent change of senior management;</li> <li>A significant change in ownership; </li> <li>A change in the financial reporting framework adopted in the preparation of the financial statements; or</li> <li>A change in other reporting requirements.</li> </ul></i>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the A.E.P. or other key audit principals been in the role for 7 consecutive years <i>(for listed, PIE and other regulated companies? )</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has a partner (including the engagement partner and engagement quality reviewer (EQR), joined the client in a key management position, and has less than two years elapsed since the end of the last audit that they worked on?</p><p><i>Careful consideration should be given as to whether this is the most appropriate course of action and clear reasoning given if the firm decides to continue in the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Will total recurring fees for client or where they are part of a group, the group exceed 10% of the gross practice income?</p><p><i>N.B. This limit is not established in the Code of Ethics issued by IESBA, but is recommended by a number of audit regulators worldwide. In the event that fees exceed this limit, it should be clearly documented why it is still appropriate for the firm to continue to act as auditor</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are there fees outstanding which are substantially in excess of our normal credit terms?</p><p><i>N.B. If outstanding fees are in excess of normal credit terms, document the period in question.</i></p><p><i>Consideration should also be given to work in progress where billing has been deferred ~ document the amount and period in question.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have the actual amount of the fees for the preceding audit, along with terms for the payment, not yet been agreed?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have any contingent fee arrangements been agreed in respect of any services?</p><p><i>NB: Audit work cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis, neither can non-audit services if the contingent fee is material to the firm, or the outcome of the non-audit services is dependent upon a future audit judgment. Tax services cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis where the fee is dependent on the proposed application of tax law which is uncertain or has not been established</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does the audit firm or any network firm act as company secretary or director for the audit client or associated undertaking?</p><p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p><br>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does any partner or director of the audit firm or network firm act as company secretary or director to the company or associated undertaking, in either an official or unofficial capacity?</p><p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) hold any shares or other beneficial interest in the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) a trustee of a trust that owns shares in the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is there any loan or other financial arrangement between a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) and the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) purchase goods or services from the client in the ordinary course of business where the value of the purchase is material to either party?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) have close family or personal relationships with the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we aware of any conflicts of interest?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we involved in, or threatened with, any litigation with this client?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have we, or any other person who can influence the audit, accepted or been given gifts or hospitality by the client in excess of that acceptable under the firm’s criteria?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we acting for a parent undertaking of a group, preparing consolidated financial statements, where we only act for an insignificant proportion of the group?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm should consider not accepting the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is there any indication that the directors may impose a limitation of scope resulting in a disclaimer of opinion being issued on the financial statements (PSA 705.13(b)(i))?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p><p><i>NB2: Where in preceding periods a disclaimer of opinion has been given arising from an imposed limitation of scope (irrespective of whether the firm acted as auditor for this period), directors’ written representations should be obtained that this situation will not arise again this year. </i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we lacking the technical expertise and support and other resources to undertake this engagement?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has assessment of the integrity of the owners, directors and management given any cause for concern?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the firm provided any valuation services (including litigation support and actuarial services) for the client that prohibit the audit from being undertaken?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: Valuation services can only be provided if they are immaterial to the financial statements or non subjective.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the firm provided any prohibited services to an entity that has recently been acquired by the audit client? </p><p><i>N.B. The firm has no more than three months after the effective date of an acquisition to eliminate threats which could impair independence.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Complete form Ac2 – Provision of Non-Audit Services to Audit Clients for all non-audit services to be provided by the firm, and any network firm to the audit client or any of its associated undertakings. Do any of these services affect our service as auditors of this client? </p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Do we know of any other factors that could affect independence or otherwise indicate that we should not accept this appointment?</p><p><i>For instance, this might include the situation where an individual who was employed by the client within the last two years has now joined the audit firm.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Based on an overall assessment of threats on an individual and cumulative basis, would an objective, reasonable and informed third party conclude that the firm’s integrity, objectivity or independence are compromised? If so, the firm shall not act as auditor.</p><br>', 'Yes', '3', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'eqr', '{\"eqr\":\"The A.E.P. deems it necessary for a review to be undertaken.\",\"eqr1\":\"N\\/Acluster\",\"eqr2\":\"N\\/As\",\"eqrr\":\"N\\/As\",\"hcc\":\"I do not\",\"iio\":\"can accept with the stated safeguards\"}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Member of informed management designated to receive results of the service</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Members of staff to be involved in non-audit service:</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Partner who will oversee provision of non-audit service:</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Fee (on an annual basis) for providing this non-audit service <strong>(a)</strong>:</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Expected audit fee in respect of the current period <strong>(b)</strong>:</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Multiple of total non-audit fees to audit fee <strong> (a/b) </strong> <i>(only required if total non-audit fees exceed audit fee)</i></p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Will the person performing the non-audit service or the partner responsible for this form part of the audit team?</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Where the question above is answered ‘yes’ the necessary safeguards should be documented here. </p><p><i>These safeguards could include:<ul> <li>the non-audit service is reviewed by a partner or senior staff member with suitable expertise and who is not part of the audit team;</li> <li>the audit is subject to an EQR; or</li> <li>the staff involved in the non-audit service are sufficiently experienced and senior to mitigate the self review threat of the partner being responsible for both assignments.</li> </ul></i></p>', '', '', '', '', '3', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '2', 'AC2', 'ac2aep', 'N/A', 'The client has informed management. I consider that there are no threats arising from fee income from the non-audit services provided / to be provided to the client and that the services can be provided.', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')
SELECT * FROM `tbl_cluster_c2` WHERE `clID` = '1' AND `fID` = '1'

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Is there information about the client’s business including, for example:</p> <ul> <li>description of the nature of the business;</li> <li>details of the products or services sold;</li> <li>details of competitors;</li> <li>industry information (including: general trends, trade restrictions, government policies and grants etc.);</li> <li>key suppliers;</li> <li>key customers; </li> <li>locations; </li> <li>client’s risk assessment process, including consideration of business risks and how they are addressed <i>(this is a key ISA requirement)</i></li> <li>details of any plans for the future (including objectives and strategies of the business)?</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are there details of the regulatory environment, including the material laws and regulations affecting the business, and how requirements relating to the regulatory environment are addressed by the client?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>If the client is part of a group, is there a diagram showing the group structure, and is the purpose of the group structure explained, including the reasons why any non-trading members of the group exist?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are there details of any branches, associates and joint ventures (including: jointly controlled operation, jointly controlled assets and jointly controlled entities), and other key investments, including information on why they have been classified as such?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Is there detail of the ultimate controlling party’s identity, including justification for this conclusion?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Have those charged with governance, and where separate, members of management been identified?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are there details of all known related parties and the nature of the relationship (has this included reviewing relevant public registers)?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are there details of how the client identifies related party relationships, transactions with related parties, and considers disclosure of transactions and balances in accordance with the financial reporting framework, including details of any controls?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Is there information about the structure of the client’s business including an organization chart detailing key personnel and their roles?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are there details of the accounting policies and estimation techniques applied (including revenue recognition) and explanation why they are considered to be appropriate to the client’s circumstances, where necessary? Where policies or estimation techniques have changed, has the reason for this been documented, and justified?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are there details of any specific reporting requirements?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are the names, addresses and contact details of the client’s professional advisers on file, including:</p> <ul> <li>bankers;</li> <li>legal advisors; and</li> <li>finance providers?</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are there details about the client’s pension scheme, including:</p> <ul> <li>the type of scheme operated;</li> <li>contributions required;</li> <li>a copy of the scheme rules; </li> <li>a copy of the trust deed; and </li> <li>details of constructive obligations?</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are there details of any share option schemes?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are there details of hedging and where applicable, hedge accounting?</p>', '', '3', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'doccors', '<p>Is there an up to date, signed, letter of engagement on file? Where the letter is not addressed to this entity <i>(for example, a letter to a parent company covers the “group”)</i>”), has it been considered whether a separate letter is required for this entity? Also, are there copies of ‘old’ letters of engagement covering the last six years?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'doccors', '<p>Are there copies of letters of authority to bankers and other lenders?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'doccors', '<p>Are there details of taxation elections and tax losses which will be required to support the taxation computations?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'doccors', '<p>Are there details (including, for example, whether they are classified as basic or non-basic financial instruments; a summary of repayment terms and duration, a copy of the agreement, review dates and security pledged) of any finance arrangements such as:</p> <ul> <li>bank loans and overdrafts;</li> <li>mortgages;</li> <li>debentures;</li> <li>significant finance leases and other finance arrangements to acquire property, plant and equipment; and</li> <li>significant operating leases?</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'doccors', '<p>Are there details (including, for example, reason for classification, valuation policy, valuations undertaken etc.) about the properties held by the client, split between:</p> <ul> <li>freehold;</li> <li>long leasehold; and</li> <li>short leasehold?</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'doccors', '<p><i>(Where applicable) </i>Is there a copy of the sales tax registration certificate and details of the sales tax status of all major operations?</p>', '', '2', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'statutory', '<p>Is there a copy of the company’s Articles of Incorporation and By-Laws?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'statutory', '<p>Are there extracts of any significant minutes from any Shareholders’ or Directors’ Meetings?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'statutory', '<p>Are there copies of key resolutions?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'statutory', '<p>Is there a copy of the Certificate of Incorporation?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'statutory', '<p>Are there details about the directors and company secretary (if applicable), including:</p> <ul> <li>name;</li> <li>date of appointment;</li> <li>date of retirement;</li> <li>interest in (including that of any immediate family) shares or debentures of the company; and</li> <li>any options granted or exercised to subscribe for shares or debentures of the company?</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'statutory', '<p>Are there details about share capital, including:</p> <ul> <li>allotted share capital;</li> <li>called up share capital;</li> <li>paid up share capital;</li> <li>shareholders;</li> <li>whether they are treated as equity or debt?</li> </ul>', 'Yes', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'accsys', '<p>Has the systems overview checklist and computer systems review checklist been prepared and reviewed?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'accsys', '<p>Is there a description of the accounting system and key controls, including:</p> <ul> <li>a list of the books of account maintained and the name of who is responsible for each;</li> <li>a chart to show the organisation of the accounts department and responsibilities of its personnel;</li> <li>narrative notes or a diagram showing an overview of the accounting system, including the interaction between manual and computerised systems; and</li> <li>details of how frequently management information (e.g. budgets, cash flow forecasts, trial balances and management accounts) is prepared, the output produced and the controls that are operated.</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'accsys', '<p>Are there details of service organisations used by the client, including:</p> <ul> <li>the nature of the services provided;</li> <li>details of the significance of the services to the client;</li> <li>the degree of interaction between the activities of the service organisation and the client;</li> <li>what controls are in place regarding the work performed by the service organisation; and</li> <li>a copy of the contract / letter of engagement?</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'accsys', '<p>Is there an updated details of the operation of each separate accounting process (including journals), including controls, in sufficient detail to undertake walk-through tests? <i> (Where relevant, this should include details of any duties payable, and should provide a commentary of relevant sales tax issues, including the rates which apply, or fall within a special scheme).</i></p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'accsys', '<p>Are there details of non-transaction based key controls in place by the company?</p>', 'Yes', '5', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Has the Regulation of Auditor’s Checklist been completed and adequate consideration given to non-audit services?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Where necessary, has our anti-money laundering due diligence assessment on this client been reviewed and updated. Also, have all key issues documented on this assessment been incorporated into the staff briefing?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Have points forward from the prior period (including, if appropriate, last year’s management letter and financial statements) been reviewed and suitably actioned?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Have any prior period modifications of the audit opinion or emphasis of matter paragraphs been reviewed and consideration given to the effect on corresponding amounts and whether a modification or emphasis of matter paragraph is required in this period?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Has the Permanent File Checklist been completed, and have all assumptions used to arrive at accounting estimates used by the client been documented?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Have preliminary analytical procedures been undertaken and has client involvement in the preplanning process been adequately documented?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Has the businesses inherent risk and control environment been assessed?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Has inherent risk been assessed for each material class of transaction or balance down to assertion level and have audit programmes been tailored to address the risks? </p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Where it is planned to test controls, has control risk been assessed for each material class of transaction or balance down to assertion level and have higher level controls also been assessed?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Has materiality and performance materiality been calculated?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Has an assignment plan been prepared?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Are there any special or additional reporting requirements relevant to this client (including to parent company auditors), if so have they been adequately addressed?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Have sample sizes been calculated?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Have staff discussed fraud, risk and related parties, including considering the possibility of breaches of law and regulations, and been briefed on all other relevant matters?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Has a planning letter been set to the client?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p><b>Recording</b></p>\r\n<p>Has the Systems Overview and Computer Systems Review checklist been reviewed and has adequate consideration been given to the risk that IT systems pose to the client?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Has the detailed description of the accounting system and controls been adequately recorded for every material transaction cycle (including those operated by service organisations)?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Does the accounting system provide a reliable basis for the preparation of accurate financial statements and has the audit practice got an adequate understanding of systems and controls as confirmed by walkthrough tests?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Has an adequate understanding been obtained on non-transaction based controls, such as the use of budgets, management accounts and internal audit functions etc.?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Based on the information on the permanent file, and audit tests, have adequate accounting records been kept?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>If reliance has been placed on internal controls:</p> <ul> <li>Did the tests of control justify reliance?</li> <li>Were weaknesses, identified in the evaluation process, followed up by adequate substantive tests?</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p><b>Fieldwork</b></p>\r\n<p>Has the fieldwork addressed the risks identified at the planning stage and been adequately directed by suitably tailored audit programmes?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have the terms of engagement not yet been agreed?</p><i><p>If any of the following factors are relevant to this audit assignment, a new letter of engagement should be issued:</p><ul> <li>A recent change of senior management;</li> <li>A significant change in ownership; </li> <li>A change in the financial reporting framework adopted in the preparation of the financial statements; or</li> <li>A change in other reporting requirements.</li> </ul></i>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the A.E.P. or other key audit principals been in the role for 7 consecutive years <i>(for listed, PIE and other regulated companies? )</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has a partner (including the engagement partner and engagement quality reviewer (EQR), joined the client in a key management position, and has less than two years elapsed since the end of the last audit that they worked on?</p><p><i>Careful consideration should be given as to whether this is the most appropriate course of action and clear reasoning given if the firm decides to continue in the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Will total recurring fees for client or where they are part of a group, the group exceed 10% of the gross practice income?</p><p><i>N.B. This limit is not established in the Code of Ethics issued by IESBA, but is recommended by a number of audit regulators worldwide. In the event that fees exceed this limit, it should be clearly documented why it is still appropriate for the firm to continue to act as auditor</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are there fees outstanding which are substantially in excess of our normal credit terms?</p><p><i>N.B. If outstanding fees are in excess of normal credit terms, document the period in question.</i></p><p><i>Consideration should also be given to work in progress where billing has been deferred ~ document the amount and period in question.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have the actual amount of the fees for the preceding audit, along with terms for the payment, not yet been agreed?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have any contingent fee arrangements been agreed in respect of any services?</p><p><i>NB: Audit work cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis, neither can non-audit services if the contingent fee is material to the firm, or the outcome of the non-audit services is dependent upon a future audit judgment. Tax services cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis where the fee is dependent on the proposed application of tax law which is uncertain or has not been established</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does the audit firm or any network firm act as company secretary or director for the audit client or associated undertaking?</p><p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p><br>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does any partner or director of the audit firm or network firm act as company secretary or director to the company or associated undertaking, in either an official or unofficial capacity?</p><p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) hold any shares or other beneficial interest in the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) a trustee of a trust that owns shares in the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is there any loan or other financial arrangement between a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) and the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) purchase goods or services from the client in the ordinary course of business where the value of the purchase is material to either party?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) have close family or personal relationships with the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we aware of any conflicts of interest?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we involved in, or threatened with, any litigation with this client?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have we, or any other person who can influence the audit, accepted or been given gifts or hospitality by the client in excess of that acceptable under the firm’s criteria?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we acting for a parent undertaking of a group, preparing consolidated financial statements, where we only act for an insignificant proportion of the group?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm should consider not accepting the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is there any indication that the directors may impose a limitation of scope resulting in a disclaimer of opinion being issued on the financial statements (PSA 705.13(b)(i))?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p><p><i>NB2: Where in preceding periods a disclaimer of opinion has been given arising from an imposed limitation of scope (irrespective of whether the firm acted as auditor for this period), directors’ written representations should be obtained that this situation will not arise again this year. </i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we lacking the technical expertise and support and other resources to undertake this engagement?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has assessment of the integrity of the owners, directors and management given any cause for concern?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the firm provided any valuation services (including litigation support and actuarial services) for the client that prohibit the audit from being undertaken?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: Valuation services can only be provided if they are immaterial to the financial statements or non subjective.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the firm provided any prohibited services to an entity that has recently been acquired by the audit client? </p><p><i>N.B. The firm has no more than three months after the effective date of an acquisition to eliminate threats which could impair independence.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Complete form Ac2 – Provision of Non-Audit Services to Audit Clients for all non-audit services to be provided by the firm, and any network firm to the audit client or any of its associated undertakings. Do any of these services affect our service as auditors of this client? </p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Do we know of any other factors that could affect independence or otherwise indicate that we should not accept this appointment?</p><p><i>For instance, this might include the situation where an individual who was employed by the client within the last two years has now joined the audit firm.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Based on an overall assessment of threats on an individual and cumulative basis, would an objective, reasonable and informed third party conclude that the firm’s integrity, objectivity or independence are compromised? If so, the firm shall not act as auditor.</p><br>', 'Yes', '3', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c1` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Where the question above is answered ‘yes’ the necessary safeguards should be documented here. </p><p><i>These safeguards could include:<ul> <li>the non-audit service is reviewed by a partner or senior staff member with suitable expertise and who is not part of the audit team;</li> <li>the audit is subject to an EQR; or</li> <li>the staff involved in the non-audit service are sufficiently experienced and senior to mitigate the self review threat of the partner being responsible for both assignments.</li> </ul></i></p>', '', '', '', '', '3', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Is there information about the client’s business including, for example:</p> <ul> <li>description of the nature of the business;</li> <li>details of the products or services sold;</li> <li>details of competitors;</li> <li>industry information (including: general trends, trade restrictions, government policies and grants etc.);</li> <li>key suppliers;</li> <li>key customers; </li> <li>locations; </li> <li>client’s risk assessment process, including consideration of business risks and how they are addressed <i>(this is a key ISA requirement)</i></li> <li>details of any plans for the future (including objectives and strategies of the business)?</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>Are there details of the regulatory environment, including the material laws and regulations affecting the business, and how requirements relating to the regulatory environment are addressed by the client?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'genmat', '<p>If the client is part of a group, is there a diagram showing the group structure, and is the purpose of the group structure explained, including the reasons why any non-trading members of the group exist?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'accsys', '<p>Is there a description of the accounting system and key controls, including:</p> <ul> <li>a list of the books of account maintained and the name of who is responsible for each;</li> <li>a chart to show the organisation of the accounts department and responsibilities of its personnel;</li> <li>narrative notes or a diagram showing an overview of the accounting system, including the interaction between manual and computerised systems; and</li> <li>details of how frequently management information (e.g. budgets, cash flow forecasts, trial balances and management accounts) is prepared, the output produced and the controls that are operated.</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'accsys', '<p>Are there details of service organisations used by the client, including:</p> <ul> <li>the nature of the services provided;</li> <li>details of the significance of the services to the client;</li> <li>the degree of interaction between the activities of the service organisation and the client;</li> <li>what controls are in place regarding the work performed by the service organisation; and</li> <li>a copy of the contract / letter of engagement?</li> </ul>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c2` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AB4', 'accsys', '<p>Is there an updated details of the operation of each separate accounting process (including journals), including controls, in sufficient detail to undertake walk-through tests? <i> (Where relevant, this should include details of any duties payable, and should provide a commentary of relevant sales tax issues, including the rates which apply, or fall within a special scheme).</i></p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

Also, have all key issues documented on this assessment been incorporated into the staff briefing?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Has the detailed description of the accounting system and controls been adequately recorded for every material transaction cycle (including those operated by service organisations)?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', 15, '1', 'AA1', 'planning', '<p>Does the accounting system provide a reliable basis for the preparation of accurate financial statements and has the audit practice got an adequate understanding of systems and controls as confirmed by walkthrough tests?</p>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2025-01-12 23:07:02')

timelineData.name: Query
